changes.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•Revamped menu UI for iOS 13, now with playback controls
•Added add to queue and fast seeking controls
•Added "Made for You" (by Spotify)
•Added three new gestures: triple tap, swipe left, and swipe right on control center
•Added more actions for gestures: like/unlike, add/remove to/from my playlist, shuffle, repeat, and add to queue
•Added ability to automatically dismiss control center when menu is presenting
•Added few more Activator actions
•Added "Advanced" section

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed many bugs that I don't remember anymore

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed tapped recent playlist resolved to playing from library in menu
•Code refactoring

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Hotfix for duplication of menu blocked touches

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
••Fixed custom URI field overlapped by keyboard

NEW FEATURES:
•Added Zefy menu that will present tonnes of actions
•Added opening Zefy menu for Activator


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•None

NEW FEATURES:
•Added double tap action to center center, where you can:
  • Play your liked songs

  • Play randomly from library

  • Play randomly from recently played

  • Play random daily mixes made by Spotify

  • Play from predefined URI

•Also added similar actions for Activator


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Updated for Spotify v8.5.93
•Updated CLI

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed long pressing on cover art not working in v1.0.6

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Updated for Spotify v8.5.86
•Added --trackradio, --playlistradio and --radiofromuri flags to cli

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Improvised Zefy to continue playing on local device when there is remote device playing

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed Zefy might not working properly on some devices
•Removed Activator dependency

NEW FEATURES:
•Added long pressing now playing cover art (iPhone & iPad) or now playing track bar (iPhone) to go to currently playing track's playlist page


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Updated for Spotify v8.5.81
•Now if Spotify has no loaded track, it'll automatically play from your library (Liked Songs)
•Fixed cold start playing tend to fails for the first time when there are other devices playing remotely (Spotify Connect)

NEW FEATURES:
-None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Apparently v1.0.2 didn't work as well as I expected, fallback to latest stable build for now

NEW FEATURES:
-None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Increased succesion rates and presumably reduced the time

NEW FEATURES:
-Added new Activator extensions: shuffle & like
-And bunch more for CLI: shuffle, like, repeat & add currently playing track to specific playlist

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-None

NEW FEATURES:
-Supporting HTTP link and every possible URI format (artist/album/radio etc)


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Better handling slow response for older devices
-Improved assurance check in the event of failure to start Spotify
-Fixed Activator icon

-Fixed CLI not working properly when app is in foreground
-Fixed multiple navigation of playlist page (CLI)
-Improved some logics
